# 二次元配列
n, m = map(int, input().split())
l = []
for _ in range(n):
    l.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

print(l)


# 辞書
n = int(input())
d = {}
for _ in range(n):
    name, score = input().split()
    d[name] = int(score)

print(d)


# 問題
# 整数の入力
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))


# 辞書型
n = int(input())
d = {}
for _ in range(n):
    name, score = input().split()
    d[name] = int(score)

s = 0
for i in d.values():
    s += i

print(s)

n = int(input())
d_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        s += d_list[i] * d_list[j]

print(s)
n = int(input())
d_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n):
        s += d_list[i] * d_list[j]

print(s)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    d_list = list(map(int, input().split()))

    s = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            s += d_list[i] * d_list[j]

    print(s)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
N = int(input())
d = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(sum([d[i]*d[j] for i in range(N) for j in range(i+1, N)]))

N = int(input())
d = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(sum([d[i]*d[j] for i in range(N) for j in range(i+1, N+1)]))
